title: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor when a .java file is open in the editor and the new class button is clicked
SR:
1. Open a .java file in the editor
2. Click the 'New class' button
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field
